args:
set -u
set -e
set -x

export PATH=$PATH:/root/google-cloud-sdk/bin
gcloud source repos clone tf2-api-tests --project=xl-ml-test
cd tf2-api-tests
pip3 install behave
behave -e ipynb_checkpoints --tags=-fails  -i aaa_connection
containers.name: train

patch.value:
set -u

set -e

set -x


export HOME=/workspace

export PATH=$PATH:/root/google-cloud-sdk/bin

gcloud source repos clone tf2-api-tests /workspace/tf2-api-tests --project=xl-ml-test

cd /workspace/tf2-api-tests

pip3 install --user behave

behave -e ipynb_checkpoints --tags=-fails -i aaa_connection
